verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> unto all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֥ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> to קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> unto them Ye shall be holy תִּהְי֑וּ <WH1961> become כִּ֣י <WH3588> for קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> [am] holy אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for I the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אִמּ֤וֹ <WH517> his mother וְאָבִיו֙ <WH1> and his father תִּירָ֔אוּ <WH3372> Ye shall fear וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> and keep אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> Turn אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלִילִ֔ים <WH457> ye not unto idols וֵֽאלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> gods מַסֵּכָ֔ה <WH4541> to yourselves molten לֹ֥א <WH3808> or תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> nor make לָכֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וְכִ֧י <WH3588> now when תִזְבְּח֛וּ <WH2076> And if ye offer זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <WH7522> it at your own will תִּזְבָּחֻֽהוּ׃ <WH2076> ye shall offer

בְּי֧וֹם <WH3117> the same day זִבְחֲכֶ֛ם <WH2077> ye offer יֵאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> It shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <WH4283> it and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <WH3498> and if ought remain עַד־ <WH5704> until י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> until the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> in the fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> it shall be burnt

וְאִ֛ם <WH518> if הֵאָכֹ֥ל <WH3605> it יֵאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> And if it be eaten בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> on the third פִּגּ֥וּל <WH6292> it [is] abominable ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> it shall not be accepted

וְאֹֽכְלָיו֙ <WH398> Therefore [every one] that eateth עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> his iniquity יִשָּׂ֔א <WH5375> it shall bear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> the hallowed thing יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD חִלֵּ֑ל <WH2490> because he hath profaned וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> from among his people

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶם֙ <WH7114> And when ye reap אֶת־ <WH853> קְצִ֣יר <WH7105> the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֔ם <WH776> of your land לֹ֧א <WH3808> nor תְכַלֶּ֛ה <WH3615> thou shalt not wholly reap פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> the corners שָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> of thy field לִקְצֹ֑ר <WH7614> Sheba וְלֶ֥קֶט <WH3951> the gleanings קְצִֽירְךָ֖ <WH7105> of thy harvest לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תְלַקֵּֽט׃ <WH3950> neither shalt thou gather

וְכַרְמְךָ֙ <WH3754> thy vineyard לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תְעוֹלֵ֔ל <WH5953> And thou shalt not glean וּפֶ֥רֶט <WH6528> [every] grape כַּרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> of thy vineyard לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <WH3950> neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <WH6041> them for the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> and stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

לֹ֖א <WH3808> nor תִּגְנֹ֑בוּ <WH1589> Ye shall not steal וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תְכַחֲשׁ֥וּ <WH3584> neither deal falsely וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תְשַׁקְּר֖וּ <WH8266> neither lie אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> one בַּעֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH5997> to another

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשָּׁבְע֥וּ <WH7650> And ye shall not swear בִשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> falsely וְחִלַּלְתָּ֛ <WH2490> neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> of thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <WH6231> Thou shalt not defraud אֶת־ <WH853> רֵֽעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> thy neighbour וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִגְזֹ֑ל <WH1497> neither rob לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תָלִ֞ין <WH3885> shall not abide פְּעֻלַּ֥ת <WH6468> [him] the wages שָׂכִ֛יר <WH7916> of him that is hired אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> with thee all night until the morning

לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תְקַלֵּ֣ל <WH7043> Thou shalt not curse חֵרֵ֔שׁ <WH2795> the deaf וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before עִוֵּ֔ר <WH5787> the blind לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> nor put מִכְשֹׁ֑ל <WH4383> a stumblingblock וְיָרֵ֥אתָ <WH3372> but shalt fear מֵּאֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

לֹא־ <WH3808> no תַעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> Ye shall do עָ֙וֶל֙ <WH5766> no unrighteousness בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> in judgment לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> thou shalt not respect פְנֵי־ <WH6440> the person דָ֔ל <WH1800> of the poor וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <WH1921> nor honour פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the person גָד֑וֹל <WH1419> of the mighty בְּצֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> [but] in righteousness תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> shalt thou judge עֲמִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5997> thy neighbour

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תֵלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> go רָכִיל֙ <WH7400> up and down [as] a talebearer בְּעַמֶּ֔יךָ <WH5971> among thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> neither shalt thou stand עַל־ <WH5921> against דַּ֣ם <WH1818> against the blood רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> of thy neighbour אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשְׂנָ֥א <WH8130> Thou shalt not hate אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> thy brother בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> in thine heart הוֹכֵ֤חַ <WH3198> thou shalt in any wise תּוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <WH3198> rebuke אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH5997> thy neighbour וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and not suffer עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> because חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> sin

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִקֹּ֤ם <WH5358> Thou shalt not avenge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִטֹּר֙ <WH5201> nor bear any grudge אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children עַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> of thy people וְאָֽהַבְתָּ֥ <WH157> but thou shalt love לְרֵעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> thy neighbour כָּמ֑וֹךָ <WH3644> as thyself אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

אֶֽת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַי֮ <WH2708> my statutes תִּשְׁמֹרוּ֒ <WH8104> Ye shall keep בְּהֶמְתְּךָ֙ <WH929> Thou shalt not let thy cattle לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תַרְבִּ֣יעַ <WH7250> gender כִּלְאַ֔יִם <WH3610> with a diverse kind שָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> thy field לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִזְרַ֣ע <WH2232> thou shalt not sow כִּלְאָ֑יִם <WH3610> with mingled seed וּבֶ֤גֶד <WH899> neither shall a garment כִּלְאַ֙יִם֙ <WH3610> mingled שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <WH8162> of linen and woollen לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> come עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> and פ

וְ֠אִישׁ <WH376> And whosoever כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now if יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> lieth אֶת־ <WH854> with אִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> with a woman שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> seed זֶ֗רַע <WH2233> child וְהִ֤וא <WH1931> who שִׁפְחָה֙ <WH8198> that [is] a bondmaid נֶחֱרֶ֣פֶת <WH2778> betrothed לְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> to an husband וְהָפְדֵּה֙ <WH6299> and not at all לֹ֣א <WH3808> no נִפְדָּ֔תָה <WH6299> redeemed א֥וֹ <WH176> and חֻפְשָׁ֖ה <WH2668> nor freedom לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor נִתַּן־ <WH5414> given לָ֑הּ בִּקֹּ֧רֶת <WH1244> her she shall be scourged תִּהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יוּמְת֖וּ <WH4191> they shall not be put to death כִּי־ <WH3588> because לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor חֻפָּֽשָׁה׃ <WH2666> because she was not free

וְהֵבִ֤יא <WH935> And he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <WH817> his trespass offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֵ֖יל <WH352> [even] a ram אָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> for a trespass offering

וְכִפֶּר֩ <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <WH5921> and הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest בְּאֵ֤יל <WH352> for him with the ram הָֽאָשָׁם֙ <WH817> of the trespass offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> for חַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֑א <WH2398> which he hath done וְנִסְלַ֣ח <WH5545> shall be forgiven ל֔וֹ מֵחַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> and the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָֽא׃ <WH2398> which he hath done פ

וְכִי־ <WH3588> When תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> And when ye shall come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> into the land וּנְטַעְתֶּם֙ <WH5193> and shall have planted כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> all manner of trees מַאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> for food וַעֲרַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH6188> shall count עָרְלָת֖וֹ <WH6190> forbidden אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> the fruit שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֛ם עֲרֵלִ֖ים <WH6189> shall it be as uncircumcised לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> unto you it shall not be eaten

וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הָרְבִיעִ֔ת <WH7243> But in the fourth יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> all פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> all the fruit קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> thereof shall be holy הִלּוּלִ֖ים <WH1974> to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַחֲמִישִׁ֗ת <WH2549> And in the fifth תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> shall ye eat אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְי֔וֹ <WH6529> of the fruit לְהוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> thereof that it may yield לָכֶ֖ם תְּבוּאָת֑וֹ <WH8393> unto you the increase אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> thereof I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> Ye shall not eat עַל־ <WH5921> with הַדָּ֑ם <WH1818> [any thing] with the blood לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תְנַחֲשׁ֖וּ <WH6049> nor observe times וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תְעוֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5172> neither shall ye use enchantment

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַקִּ֔פוּ <WH5362> Ye shall not round פְּאַ֖ת <WH6285> the corners רֹאשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7218> of your heads וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH7843> neither shalt thou mar אֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> the corners זְקָנֶֽךָ׃ <WH2206> of thy beard

וְשֶׂ֣רֶט <WH8296> cuttings לָנֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the dead לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> Ye shall not make בִּבְשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <WH1320> in your flesh וּכְתֹ֣בֶת <WH3793> any קַֽעֲקַ֔ע <WH7085> any marks לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> nor print בָּכֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> upon you I [am] the LORD

אַל־ <WH408> not תְּחַלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> Do not prostitute אֶֽת־ <WH853> בִּתְּךָ֖ <WH1323> thy daughter לְהַזְנוֹתָ֑הּ <WH2181> to cause her to be a whore וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תִזְנֶ֣ה <WH2181> fall to whoredom הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> lest the land וּמָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> become full הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land זִמָּֽה׃ <WH2154> of wickedness

אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <WH7676> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <WH8104> Ye shall keep וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> my sanctuary תִּירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> and reverence אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְנ֤וּ <WH6437> Regard אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֹבֹת֙ <WH178> not them that have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֔ים <WH3049> after wizards אַל־ <WH408> not תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> neither seek לְטָמְאָ֣ה <WH2930> to be defiled בָהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> by them I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God
